heading: D4Planner Update for 2.0 PTR Patch!
content: Today, we are excited to share with you the newest update of D4Planner, which is fully updated with the datamined information from the Diablo 4 2.0 PTR patch! You can access the 2.0 PTR patch version of D4Planner by clicking on the PTR button at the top of the planner: You can now make your planners with all the new stuff coming in the 2.0 PTR Patch such as new , new Skills like and much more! This also includes new Glyphs and Paragon Board changes as well as changes to Item Quality and Affixes! Besides all these new skills and items, all datamined changes are available for you to test out on your own build! As a reminder, ! Check it out! We hope you enjoy the Season of the Infernal Hordes with the aid of our Season 5 guides, tier lists and resources as well as our Patch 1.5.1 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.0 PTR and Vessel of Hatred and the will provide you with the most accurate resources and guides out there! With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
